meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of psoriasis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a special cream for my psoriatic skin.
meanings.sent2: Her psoriatic condition required regular medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The psoriatic patches on his elbows made him look like a spotted leopard.
meanings.sent4: The psoriatic nature of the disease was evident in the flaky skin.
meanings.sent5: The psoriatic symptoms were causing her discomfort and embarrassment.
